prompt:
A seductive Korean woman in her 20s sitting on the floor beside a sofa, framed waist-up to mid-
thigh, intimate candid mood.
Pose: legs folded to one side, hips angled, torso subtly arched; one hand gripping the sofa edge,
the other hand at the back of her neck.
Expression: direct gaze, half-lidded eyes, parted lips, no smile.
Outfit: matte ribbed knit top + high-waist lounge shorts (tasteful), visible texture and stretch lines.
Lighting: late afternoon side window light + pale wall bounce, smooth highlight roll-off.
Camera: 85mm f/1.8 handheld candid. Film: Portra 400, subtle grain.
